### Homogeneity Statistics

The uncertainty contribution of the Homogeneity measurements `U_bb` (uncertainty between bottles) is calculated for each analyte based on formula and is transfered to user specified column in the material table of the certification module.

***Note!*** Transfer is only sucessfull in case that an analyte of matching name can be found found (see colum`In_Cert_Module`).


